name: Sci-Run
description:
Started Developing 27.03.2021

Published in 15.01.2022

This is a "Mobile Runner Game"

A mad scientist works on a different virus. However, something goes wrong and the scientist starts to run after this disappointment to save humanity which suddenly falls under his responsibility.

Controls: 

Tap & Slide the screen for Mobile. Use mouse and arrow keys for PC

Team Sermath
